title: VERIDIA Selects Digital CrossTV and WhereverTV as Exclusive Broadcaster of Release Party
text:
VERIDIA Selects Digital CrossTV and WhereverTV as Exclusive Broadcaster of Release Party VERIDIA to Headline Historic 3rd and Lindsley Venue in Nashville and Simulcast Live-Stream on WhereverTV OTT Platform October 08, 2015 14:16 ET | Source: WhereverTV Broadcasting Corporation 
PITTSBURGH, Oct. 08, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Digital CrossTV has signed an exclusive deal with WORD Records recording artist VERIDIA to broadcast live the band’s EP release party on Friday October 9 th at 7pm CST from the iconic Nashville venue, 3 rd and Lindsley. VERIDIA is a Christian Rock Band receiving critical acclaim on the national music scene for their inspirational messages and crossover potential. VERIDIA means truth. The band is currently concluding their successful US tour with this show in Nashville. Meanwhile, VERIDIA is receiving rave reviews from fans and critics alike with the release of their new EP “Pretty Lies”. “Pretty Lies” entered the I-tunes chart in the top 10 on September 25 th . “VERIDIA has proven that they have the power to really go the distance with memorable and passionate music that can play with the best veterans of the industry,” says JJ Francesco of New Release Today. “With a growing arsenal of fans, the band takes a huge step towards a signature sonic offering that is sure to cement the group as one of the premiere new rock acts.” “The growth of ‘Over the Top’ technology allows VERIDIA to connect with the fan base all over the world in a very personal way,” says manager Scott Welch. “Digital CrossTV and the WhereverTV platform are presenting artists with creative and technological expertise, and we are excited about sharing the band’s live performance globally,” he added. Edward D. Ciofani, CEO of WhereverTV stated, “The Christian music format continues to deal with many of the same challenges the rest of the music industry faces. The ability to access live content across multiple platforms and on any smart device is the wave of the future. I am excited about presenting VERIDIA’s CD release party live and giving the band the increased visibility and the opportunity to be heard globally by their fans. We at WhereverTV believe this is just the beginning and could be the thing that revives the intimate relationship between artist and fans and how they come together. As previously announced, Digital CrossTV and WhereverTV have entered into a Letter of Intent to create a long term distribution agreement utilizing WhereverTV’s OTT platform." For more background information about WhereverTV, please click: Internet TV , Over the Top , WhereverTV , or OTC Markets . For more information about VERIDIA, please click www.veridiamusic.com . About WhereverTV Broadcasting Corporation (Symbol: TVTV) 
Founded in 2007, WhereverTV is the next generation subscription television service providing consumers with live-streaming, genre-specific, and in-language viewing choices from around the world, delivered to anywhere in the world, and through any internet enabled device. Programming is identical to existing broadcast and distribution providers with the only differences being that the broadcast signals are accessed through the internet via an over the top (OTT) platform, and channel management is handled by company’s patented Interactive Program Guide (IPG) technology. WhereverTV provides an economically beneficial and completely versatile alternative to traditional cable and satellite services, with the added benefits of personalization and portability. Also known as Internet TV , WhereverTV delivers these same channels, shows and events to SmartTVs and digital media receivers including: GoogleTV, AppleTV, Roku, Amazon FireTV, iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Droid Smartphone, and TabletPCs. The WhereverTV platform enables subscribers to access licensed and free-to-air content across these devices with the IPG across unlimited geographies, and wherever there is internet connectivity. The customer viewing experiences are based on customer location (geo-targeting) and content-rights management (subscriptions). Current in-language subscription offerings include Arabic TV, French TV, Italian TV, and Moroccan TV. Current genre specific subscriptions include NEWS channels, faith based channels and more. Apps are presently available for free in App Stores for iOS (Apple), Android, GoogleTV and Amazon FireTV devices. DVR functionality to record your shows and view later is presently in the works. Licensed US TV content subscriptions will be available in 2015. Please visit: www.wherever.tv , for more info.
